body.name: ADBIU 2024 Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack (Adjustable Height/Length) Snap-On Design 2 Tier Large Dish Drainer Kitchen Organization and Storage 24" - 35.6"(L) x 12"(W) x 19" - 22"(H)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 52 mins
features: 【Attention 】We double the screws on the 2 crossbars to solve the shaky，bending and uneven problems which were proposed on the reviews in the past! You can find the similar over sink dish rack in other stores using only 2 screws on the crossbar, so they still have these problems

【Tips Before Purchase】Please carefully measure the length of your sink at first. Your Sink Length should be ≤35.5 inches and if it beyond 35.5", please choose our another 3 tier over sink dish rack. Also mind the faucet (Height≤17") and the cabinet (another 15 or 20 inches away from the upper cabinet to place the plates), the height of this rack can be adjusted from 19" to 22", so please make sure you measure your faucet and cabinet so that the dish rack doesn’t touch them or get in the way.

【Dimensions】24" - 35.5"(L) x 12"(W) x 19" - 22"(H). The length and Height can be adjusted by the short screws. (Please watch the attached video and you will easily understand the structure and installation steps)
【Material】201 Stainless steel covered by black baking finish.
body.description: Length-Adjustable Over Sink Dish Rack Specification Dimension: 24" - 35.5"(L) x 12"(W) x 19" - 22"(H) ( Note: Manual measurement will inevitably have a margin of error of 0.5in. ) Material Premium Stainless Steel covered by black baking finish, no rusting, long lasting durability and easy clean. Package List Package: 4 suction cups，10 Steel Tubes, 1 bowl rack, 1 cutlery holder, 1 chopping board rack, 1 dishes rack, 1 glass holder, 1 square basket and 5 hooks. All these parts are adjustable and removable thus you can DIY them to your preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freed up counter space
reviews.reviewText: These really free up counter space! They are a bit tricky to put together as the instructions aren't great. But once you get the hang of it it's easy peasy. It also appears to be quite durable and able to handle a lot of weight. I had to rearrange the baskets because of my sink space but that was easy too. I highly recommend this item if you are short on counter space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit perfectly and is great place to dry everything. It’s awesome thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this dish drying stand! I can't think of anything negative to say about it and believe me I'm very picky when buying online over $20. It's worth every penny. It opened up the whole corner of my counter which gave me so much more space to use. It doesn't get water anywhere but the sink so it's designed well. It holds a lot more then it seems too. I love that this includes the pan and lid drying area, so many don't have that option. My sink is a double sink that is 33.5" wide, I had trouble finding one of this quality that extended wide enough. This one expands to 35" and has suction cups to keep it from sliding around. It just fits. The pot and pan section has dividers that can be moved to fit the size you need. This is definitely high quality for the reasonable price. It would make a great gift too. Just make sure your sink is 35" wide or less. It even has a dish towel drying bar which is really nice because it keeps it from dripping on the floor or counter top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Always wanted one, no dishwasher, very limited counter space. I love the look and it’s a great invention. But when I finally get the dishes up there I feel it’s going to collapse inwards. So mixed on if I like it or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best $ spent yet on our Kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I have a garden window that faces our bird feeder that I did not want to obstruct, but did want to clear some counter space in a key area around our sink! This foots that bill wonderfully! I was concerned about how sturdy it would be. So far I have loaded it up with no problems there and all of my cleaning tools and products are close at hand and organized! Gotta try this if you are looking for a great way to organize an otherwise messy area of your kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rust on new item
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy to receive this item, until I saw this rust, photo uploaded. Description claimed that item will not rust. I'm bit disappointed about that.Overall very convenient and sturdy.
